name: Onset (itch)
description:
Onset is my first game made using the Godot game engine. It is an endless runner game that works on both desktop and mobile browsers.

Thanks to Godot, I finally made a WebGL game that can also work on mobile browsers.

HOW TO PLAY

Jump and land on the platforms to gain points. Then try to outrun the spikes to level up.

CONTROLS

Keyboard
Movement:  A/Left Arrow Key or D/Right Arrow Key
Jump: W, Up Arrow Key or Space Bar
Dash: Press a movement key twice

Touch
Movement: Tap
Jump: Swipe Up
Dash: Double Tap

TOOLS

Audacity
Bfxr
Gimp
Inkscape Studio
Kdenlive
LMMS
OBS
Godot
VLC

BGM

Goat by Wayne Jones
